title: Ticket #3189: condor_dagman not managing all needed events in user log
description:
DAGMan does not seem to handle all the needed events when parsing the userlog.

In particular, ULOG_JOB_RECONNECT_FAILED is not considered at all (a relatively frequent event in glidein deployments)

I am not an expert, but this seems the case when reading the 

src/condor_dagman/dag.cpp
file.

A proper DAGMan expert should check if my interpretation of the code is correct.
remarks:
2012-Aug-09 22:52:01 by nwp:
When ULOG_JOB_RECONNECT_FAILED happens, the job goes to Idle state, correct?

2012-Aug-09 22:56:11 by sfiligoi:
That's my understanding.
2012-Aug-23 14:12:04 by zmiller:
Bulk change of target version from v070802 to v070803 using ./ticket-target-mover.
